CONTACT ME

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#282723″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Behind this website there is no organisation, or ‘team’. There is only a writer, sitting at a desk, precariously balanced on the threshold of a wild valley hidden in the hollows of the knobbly spine of the Pennines in the far north of England, usually with a rescue border collie dog or three – or the Cat Formerly Known as the Kitten of the Apocalypse – at her feet. It’s always a pleasure to hear from readers, but please do forgive if I’m limited in the number of personal replies that are possible in an inbox that always looks like an inundation. (And I’m afraid it’s never possible for me to respond to the many requests that I receive for help with research, or offering up resources or giving general advice, or to read and comment on your work, which would leave me no writing/ living time at all.)

Please be sure to use the correct contact person and contact details – given below – for your specific query, otherwise it won’t be seen.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.4″ text_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_font_size=”27px” custom_margin=”||12px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]
